pages.text: top of page THE MENU Our menu changes weekly and consists of 5-6 artisanal cheeses from the finest dairies both here and abroa d. Each has a great story and we love to share. Always on hand are several salamis, jamón, mortadella, pâtés, tinned seafood and chocolates. ​ We hope you'll join us. bottom of page

top of page interior1 1/3 ABOUT US Saint Urban's is a cozy, candle-lit, European-inspired wine and cheese bar with patio seating. Located in Charleston, SC beside the Shellmore within Mount Plea sant’s I’ON Square, we are just five minutes off the peninsula. We feature a rotating assortment of eclectic international wines, cocktails, farmhouse cheeses & charcuterie, tinned seafood, and rarely seen chocolates. bottom of page

top of page PRIVATE EVENTS Saint Urban's is a seriously fun place to throw a party. We're able to accommodate 28 inside and up to 75 with the addition of our patio and loggia. Please inquire via and we can't wait to hear more. hello@sainturbans.com private1 private3 interior2 private1 1/4 bottom of page
top of page THE BAR IS OPEN 5-10PM, TUES-SAT We serve a lovely list of international wines by the glass and bottle. A stiff cocktail? Yes, we do that too. bottom of page
